generations.inputText:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world.

Tone: comical, informative

Audience: college students
generations.text: Looking to learn a new language before your semester abroad? LangLang is the perfect app for you! With teachers from all over the world, you can learn any language you want, on your own time. Plus, LangLang is totally affordable, making it the perfect option for budget-minded students. So what are you waiting for?

generations.inputText:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world.

Tone: comical, informative

Audience: college students
generations.text:
Hey, language learners! 

There's a new app in town that'll make your learning experience ten times better. LangLang connects you to the best language teachers out there, so you can get all the help you need to improve your skills. 

Plus, it's really affordable. You can get a lesson for as little as $5.
